Total family income

Source: R/gss_vars_17.R
income06.Rd

income06

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question In which of these groups did your total family income, from all sources, fall last year before taxes, that is. Just tell me the letter.

Values

  • [1] under $1 000

  • [2] $1 000 to 2 999

  • [3] $3 000 to 3 999

  • [4] $4 000 to 4 999

  • [5] $5 000 to 5 999

  • [6] $6 000 to 6 999

  • [7] $7 000 to 7 999

  • [8] $8 000 to 9 999

  • [9] $10000 to 12499

  • [10] $12500 to 14999

  • [11] $15000 to 17499

  • [12] $17500 to 19999

  • [13] $20000 to 22499

  • [14] $22500 to 24999

  • [15] $25000 to 29999

  • [16] $30000 to 34999

  • [17] $35000 to 39999

  • [18] $40000 to 49999

  • [19] $50000 to 59999

  • [20] $60000 to 74999

  • [21] $75000 to $89999

  • [22] $90000 to $109999

  • [23] $110000 to $129999

  • [24] $130000 to $149999

  • [25] $150000 or over

  • [NA(d)] don't know [NA(i)] iap [NA(j)] I don't have a job [NA(m)] dk, na, iap [NA(n)] no answer [NA(p)] not imputable [NA(r)] refused [NA(s)] skipped on web [NA(u)] uncodeable [NA(x)] not available in this release [NA(y)] not available in this year [NA(z)] see codebook

Question Years and Ballots

ballotsyears
A/B/C/-2008, 2010, 2012, 2014
A/B/C/D2006

Overview

For further details see the GSS Data Explorer page for income06.
